alternativeNames: Starmühler, Walter Karl; Rottensteiner, Walter Karl
comments: Son of Walter Mucher (born 1942). Walter Karl Mucher changed his surname to Starmühler in 1993 and in 2012 to Rottensteiner.
examples: Aconitum ser. Toxicum (Rchb.) Mucher in Phyton (Austria), 33(1): 54 (1993).
source: IK db. Full name and year of birth from the author's website
